Text: You might want to add that System 1.1 only ran off a floppy disk on the very first Macs from 1984-85, and can't be installed on "modern" Macs without using an emulator such as Mini vMac. Anyone interested in doing that should have a look at http://www.rolli.ch/MacPlus/welcome.html where other versions of the Mac's system software can be found as well.

@Jero2000

Thanks pal. Sadly I can't edit the description, but they will probably read your comment.
